name: Mini Brief - Week2
description:
Click the three video links on the side

In this brief, I demonstrated my hobbies and anxieties. I really like watching online courses in different areas on YouTube. I interested in a lot of things, but I rarely trying those things in practical. I get a kind of illusory satisfaction about learning different fields just by watching online tutorials. This brief shows that I was sitting in front of the computer browse different courses consistently and repeatedly to keep myself in high spirits. And the player was observing me from the computer side.
